attributes.action: Why do I have to pay TV Liecene when I no longer watch or use BBC services?
attributes.background: I no longer watch BBC or ever have used it’s services so why do I have to pay TV Liecence? Most people now stream services so I don’t see the need for BBC?

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We can't accept your petition because we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You may also wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/231342
